text: Ojo kofironi Makka dar rūi zamin namegardand, to ʙuʙinand, monandi Odu Samud va amsoli onhoro, ki nisʙat az kofironi Makka nerūe ʙeştar doştaand, oqiʙati onho cī şud? Heç ciz dar osmonhovu zamin nest, ki Allohro notavon sozad. Haroina, Ū dono ast ʙa kirdori ʙandagonaş va tavonost ʙar halok kardani onho
